item.title: Supreme Court upholds TikTok ban, threatening app's existence in the U.S.
item.description: The decision resolves a long-running legal dispute between the Department of Justice and TikTok. But experts say President-elect Donald Trump will now...

item.title: Biden says the Equal Rights Amendment is law. What happens next is unclear
item.description: To come into effect, the constitutional amendment would need to be formally published or certified by the National Archivist who has declined to do so...

item.title: Food pantries are bracing for more demand if the Trump administration cuts food aid
item.description: The first Trump administration tried to scale back who gets food benefits, and allies aim to try again. Food pantries say they're already busier than ...

item.title: Fire at one of the world's largest battery plants forces evacuations in California
item.description: A major fire erupted south of San Francisco at the Moss Landing Power Plant, forcing hundreds to evacuate. So far, the fire has stayed in the facility...

item.title: Israel's security cabinet approves Gaza ceasefire and hostage deal
item.description: Israel's security cabinet has voted to approve a ceasefire deal to end the fighting in Gaza. Full cabinet approval is expected later today.
